titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the assembling the members of both Houses at Oxford, upon occasion of the invasion by the Scots
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, the 22th day of December, in the nineteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
